data.text: Balami yi a to fa fala a yi rafan Alatala ma a xa duba Isirayila xa. Nayi, a mi kɔɛraya feene rawali alo waxatin danguxine yi. Koni a yi a yɛɛ rafindi tonbonna binni.
Balami to a yɛɛne rakeli, a yi Isirayila kaane to malanxi bɔnsɔn yɛɛn ma. Nayi, Alaa Nii Sariɲanxin yi godo a ma.
Balami yi waliyiya falane ti, a naxa,
N ni ito nan falama,
Yaxuba bɔnsɔnna,
E wuya bɔxɔn fari alo baane,
E ige ramaradene rafema nɛn ken!
Ala nan faxi e ra
E e sama nɛn alo yatane.
Balaki yi xɔlɔ Balami ma han! A yi a yiine bɔnbɔ, a yi a fala Balami xa, a naxa, “N ni i xilixi nɛn alogo i xa n yaxune danga, koni i tan bata duba e xa sanɲa ma saxan.
Iki keli be, siga i konni. N yi a ragidixi nɛn n xa i saren fi han, koni Alatala bata i kuma!”
Balami yi Balaki yabi, a naxa, “Anu, n na a fala nɛn i ya xɛrane xa, n naxa,
‘Hali Balaki a banxin so n yii naxan nafexi gbetin nun xɛmaan na, n mi nɔɛ Alatalaa yamarin matandɛ fefe ma. Alatala na naxan fala, fɔ n xa na nan fala.’
Awa iki, n bata siga n kon kaane fɛma. Koni ɛ tuli mati. N xa i rakolon siyani ito naxan ligama i ya yamaan na waxati famatɔni.”
Balami yi waliyiya falane ti, a naxa:
N ni ito nan falama,
N na a toma,
A Edɔn yamanan tongoma nɛn,
Nɔ tiin minima nɛn Yaxuba bɔnsɔnni,
Balami yi Amalɛkine to. A yi waliyiya falan ti, a naxa:
A mɔn yi Keni kaane to. A yi waliyiya falan ti, a naxa:
Koni Asuri na ɛ suxu konyiyani,
A mɔn yi waliyiya falan ti, a naxa:
Kunkine kelima nɛn Sipiri yi,
Balami yi keli, a xɛtɛ a konni. Balaki fan yi siga.
